text: Orhan Kapucu (born 29 September 1959 in Batman) is a Turkish former footballer and most recently the manager of Batman Petrolspor. ==Club career== Kapucu played for Fenerbahçe S.K., Diyarbakırspor, Samsunspor and Malatyaspor in the Turkish Süper Lig. ==International career== Kapucu made one appearance for the senior Turkey national football team, a qualifying match for Euro 1988 against Northern Ireland on 12 November 1986. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish footballers Category:Turkey international footballers Category:Turkish football managers Category:Samsunspor footballers Category:Malatyaspor footballers Category:Fenerbahçe S.K. footballers Category:Adanaspor footballers Category:Antalyaspor footballers Category:Çaykur Rizespor footballers Category:Batman Petrolspor footballers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Orhan Kapucu
